servinfo.title: Keyless Start Registration
servinfo.ptxt: In case of vehicle not equipped with immobilizer control system, register steering lock unit ID code in keyless start control module when keyless start control module which was used in another vehicle has been installed or steering lock unit was replaced, according to “Keyless start registration” of “Keyless Start System” under “Utility” of “Immobi and/or Keyless System” mode of SUZUKI scan tool. Refer to scan tool operator’s manual for further details.
